title: Project Manager (Islamabad)
overview: The Content Project Manager in Islamabad is responsible for workforce management, including staffing plans and resource allocation, as well as performance analysis through productivity metrics and forecasting data analysis. They should thrive in an entrepreneurial environment, be responsive to changing business needs, and have enthusiasm for continuous improvement.
